title: Weekend Review, Virginia Beach, Box Office Report, J. Anthony Brown and more.
itunes:title: Weekend Review, Virginia Beach, Box Office Report, J. Anthony Brown and more.
description:
It's Motivational Monday baby!  Junior has one of his biggest weekends ever!  Today in Church Complaints somebody mixed up the anointing oil with the CBD oil.  Leah Chase a very well known Creole chef dies at age 96.  A gunman killed 12 in Virginia Beach and this incident is considered one of the deadliest workplace shootings in history.  Andy Ruiz, Jr. made history as he became the first Mexican Heritage Heavyweight Boxing Champion as he defeated Anthony Joshua at MSG.  J. Anthony Brown gives us an update regarding his leukemia treatment.  He also talks about the Top 5 movies in the box office this past weekend.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about using disappointment to our advantage and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
